ISSUE.TITLE: Ensure CSS Bundling works in virtual directories
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: At moment CSS bundling doesn't work under a virtual directory, coz the BundlerMinifier library does not take into account the application path when transforming relative links It's limitation of BundlerMinifier (not nopCommerce). And we already write about it in the hint of this setting in admin area. P.S. Do not forget to update the hint of the setting in admin area Already asked at https://github.com/madskristensen/BundlerMinifier/issues/525
